item.title: Data Mining Review Note
item.description: Introduction I made this material as a final review note for QMUL-BUPT Module BBU6504: Data Mining. It covers key points. Note Some parts of material are adapted from the BBU6504 lecture slides and is intended for personal study and educational use only. Download Block3 Note.pdf
